summary: Implements an attention-based graph convolution layer that computes a propagation matrix from node feature cosine similarities scaled by a beta parameter and applies it to propagate features across the graph. Includes optional learnable beta and a flag to control handling of zero‑in‑degree nodes.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use graph neural network component for semi‑supervised learning tasks that leverages attention mechanisms to weight neighbor contributions, with configurable parameter learning and safety checks for isolated nodes.
